pacman.model

类 GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • pacman.model.GameModel

  • public class GameModel
extends java.util.Observable
    This class represents the game board that contains game objects.

    This class is a single instance that can be directly used by other classes. All objects is able to be generated in specific positions of the game board. Game logic is defined in this class.

    作者:
    Zhangli Wang
    另请参阅:
    GameController, ActorFactory, Cookie, DoublePortals, Ghost, LevelEntry, Maze, Score, SuperCookie, ThePacman

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      java.util.List<Cookie> cookieSet
      List of Cookie on the game board
      boolean gameEnded
      a boolean that indicates whether the game is ended
      java.util.Set<Ghost> ghosts
      Set of Ghost on the game board
      boolean infiniteGame
      a boolean that indicates whether this game is in infinite mode or not
      int level
      count of the level
      LevelEntry levelEntry
      a level entry on the game board
      int lifes
      remaining lifes of pacman on the game board
      Maze maze
      the maze that contains all the obstacles on the game board
      ThePacman pacman
      the only pacman on the game board
      DoublePortals portals
      the double portals on the game board, left portal and right portal
      Score scoreBoard
      a score board showing scorePoint and lifes on the game board
      int scorePoint
      the score point of the pacman
      SuperCookie superCookie
      The super cookie on the game board

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void clearLevel()
      Adopted in infinite mode, show the game entry.
      void endGame()
      Ends the game and reset values in this class.
      void enterNextLevel()
      Adopted in infinite mode, change some properties of this class when pacman has entered next level.
      void generateCookies()
      Generates cookies on all the paths except the safe house (center block).
      void generateGhosts()
      Generates four ghosts and add them to ghosts, two positioned on the left top side of the game board and two positioned at the right top side of the game board.
      void generateLevelEntry()
      Generate level entry on the right bottom side of the game board.
      void generatePortals()
      Generate portals, left portal is on the left gap of the game board and right portal is on the right gap of the game board.
      static GameModel getInstance()
      Get the only object available.
      void initGame()
      Initialize game components, including the maze and all game items.
      void restartGame()
      Reset the game setting.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        public static GameModel getInstance()
        Get the only object available.
        返回:
        the instance of GameModel

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        Ends the game and reset values in this class.

        Reset ghostId to one and set gameEnded to true. Notify GameController to make game ending response to view.

      • clearLevel

        public void clearLevel()
        Adopted in infinite mode, show the game entry.

        Set clearLevel as isVisible. Notify GameController to make corresponding response to view.

      • enterNextLevel

        public void enterNextLevel()
        Adopted in infinite mode, change some properties of this class when pacman has entered next level.

        Reset game setting except the Score and Lifes Refresh scoreBoard as current Score and Lifes. Slightly increase speed of ghost in the next level. Notify GameController to make corresponding response to view.

      • restartGame

        public void restartGame()
        Reset the game setting.

        Clear cookieSet and ghosts. Reset Pacman and Ghost static properties. Reset lifes and other records of the game.

      • initGame

        public void initGame()
        Initialize game components, including the maze and all game items.

      • generateGhosts

        public void generateGhosts()
        Generates four ghosts and add them to ghosts, two positioned on the left top side of the game board and two positioned at the right top side of the game board.

      • generateCookies

        public void generateCookies()
        Generates cookies on all the paths except the safe house (center block). One of the cookies is replaced with a super cookie.

      • generatePortals

        public void generatePortals()
        Generate portals, left portal is on the left gap of the game board and right portal is on the right gap of the game board.

      • generateLevelEntry

        public void generateLevelEntry()
        Generate level entry on the right bottom side of the game board.
